hackathon-description-text: In 2017, IT is being challenged to execute an addition 65% in projects.  We are looking for solutions to ensure that IT meets and exceeds this challenge through:

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Ameren Illinois – VP Customer Service & Metering Ops
Ameren Missouri – VP Business Planning & Controller
Ameren Services – VP Economic and Tech Development
Ameren Illinois – Dir Smart Grid & System Improvement

hackathon-requirements: All submissions must be entered in Devpost by 10:30 am on December 1.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $500 for each member for the Grand Prize winner team

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1901 Chouteau Ave, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Team with the best functioning product / software wins this prize.
The idea that has the most beneficial impact to Ameren's business wins this prize.
The team that thinks outside the box the best wins this prize.
The team with a solution that impacts the organization's strategy the most wins this prize.

Solution that has the most overall points in all the above 4 categories. Each solution will be judged on a scale of 1 to 10 in the above categories. The solution with the highest grand total wins the Grand prize. It will be from one of the above teams.

hackathon-location-address: 1901 Chouteau Ave, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA
